page.title: 13Weddings.
page.content: The bride arrives for the wedding in a car with white ribbons on. She is dressed in a white dress and veil. The bridegroom wears a smart suit. The bride has attendants who are called bridesmaids. The bridesmaids wear long dresses and have headbands with flowers on. The bride and bridesmaids carry posies of flowers. There is a best man who looks after the wedding rings and makes sure that everything goes smoothly. After the wedding there is a reception. There are toasts to the bride and bridegroom and then they cut the wedding cake. There is a meal at the reception and then when the tables are cleared there is dancing. There is a bar where drinks can be bought. The reception often finishes late at night.
